text.div:
Resume Task

OPERATION: Resume Task

Indicate that activity on this task can now be resumed. Removes the mark that the task is suspended, and propgates the resume to any child tasks.

URL: [base]/Task/[id]/$resume

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation

name: Resume Task
description: Indicate that activity on this task can now be resumed.  Removes the mark that the task is suspended, and propgates the resume to any child tasks.
